<center>

Hey, been another month since my last service showcase for [SmallWeb](https://smallweb.net "SmallWeb"). What's new?

* Successful launch of limited edition Singapore 1GB web hosting
* NYC is now hosted on CentOS 8 and is ready for CloudLinux 8!
* [Majority of providers have been paid for 6-12 months in advance](https://smallweb.net/blog/smallweb-contingency-planning-1/ "Majority providers have been paid for 6-12 months in advance")
* Two and three year upfront payments have been re-enabled

SmallWeb Budget Hosting Plans:

½GB NVMe/SSD - 100GB Monthly Bandwidth - 1 Websites - 1CPU, 25EP & 5MB/s I/O
